	(ObjectID=/csoEntitlement[
		UserID='[//Target/UserID]' 
		and (idmStartDate < fn:current-dateTime()) 
		and ((idmEndDate > op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('-P1D'))))
	]/csoRoles/csoRollUpRole)

		and (idmStartDate < fn:current-dateTime())

	]/csoRoles)

" OverwriteLogFile="False" /> </ns0:SequentialWorkflow>

/csoEntitlement[ not(csoRecalculate='true') and (UserID='[//Target/UserID]') and (idmStartDate < fn:current-dateTime()) and (idmEndDate > op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) and not(UserID/csoRoles=/csoEntitlement[ ObjectID='[//Target/ObjectID]' and (idmStartDate < fn:current-dateTime()) and (idmEndDate > op:add-dayTimeDuration-to-dateTime(fn:current-dateTime(), xs:dayTimeDuration('P1D'))) ]/csoRoles) ]

ResourceManagementAttribute.Value: cso-Administration: Entitlement administrators can manage roles
cso-Administration: Entitlement administrators can read requests
cso-Administration: Entitlement administrators can update Users
cso-Administration: Entitlement administrators control all entitlements
Entitlement is deleted when last role is removed
cso-Administration: Entitlement is deleted when last role is removed
Entitlements with no roles are for auto deletion
Entitlements administrators can read role group properties
cso-Administration: Entitlements administrators can read role group properties
All Groups marked with an ADS Role ID
Entitlements with no display name have display name derived
cso-Administration: Entitlements with no display name have display name derived
All Entitlements with no display name
cso-All Entitlements with no display name
cso-Administration: Recalculate entitlement owner on trigger
School Principals can read entitlement properties
cso-Administration: School Principals can read entitlement properties
All school principals (excluding those who are also school administrators)
Service Desk can read entitlement properties
cso-Administration: Service Desk can read entitlement properties
Entitlements with no start date or end date are defaulted
cso-Entitlements with no start date or end date are defaulted
All entitlements with no start date or end date
cso-All entitlements with no start date or end date
Entitlements are assigned default start and end dates
cso-Entitlements with no start date or end date are defaulted XXX
Add roles for activated user entitlements
cso-Group management: Add roles for activated user entitlements
All users can read their own entitlements
cso-Group management: All users can read their own entitlements
Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Home Page resources
cso-Group management: Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Home Page resources
Entitlements administrators admin home page options
Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Nav Bar resources
cso-Group management: Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Nav Bar resources
Entitlements administrators nav bar menu options
Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Search Scope resources
cso-Group management: Entitlement admins can see Entitlements Search Scope resources
Entitlements inherit ownership from their roles
cso-Group management: Entitlements inherit ownership from their roles
Recalculate user roles for modified current entitlements
cso-Group management: Recalculate user roles for modified current entitlements
Entitlements with at least one role and both start and end dates
Add roles to a user for new current entitlements
cso-Group management: Recalculate user roles for new current entitlements
Remove roles for expired user entitlements
cso-Group management: Remove roles for expired user entitlements
cso-Group management: School Principals can read entitlements
cso-Group management: Site Administrators can create entitlements
All site administrators (derived from ownership of one or more site roles, i.e. /csoRole/Owner)
Users can create entitlements for owner approval
cso-Group management: Users can create entitlements for owner approval
Users can maintain entitlements for roles they own
cso-Group management: Users can maintain entitlements for roles they own
All NASS-migrated user entitlements are recalculated - MPR only to be anabled by Housekeeping job!!!
cso-Housekeeping: All NASS user entitlements are recalculated
Entitlements are updated to trigger owner recalculation
cso-Housekeeping: Entitlements are updated to trigger owner recalculation
Entitlements with no display name are updated
cso-Housekeeping: Entitlements with no display name are updated
Housekeeping all entitlements with no display name
cso-Housekeeping all entitlements with no display name
Event Broker is notified when entitlement resources are modified
cso-Synchronization: Event Broker is notified when entitlement resources are modified

Activity.Description: Invokes a specified Event Broker operation list. This activity should only be used to specify either an incoming operation list for the FIM Portal MA, or to point at a baselining operation list.
